content: अवकीर्णिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अवकीर्णमनेन इष्टा° इनि] Violating the vow or engagements of continence. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (--र्णी) A religious student who has committed an act of incontinence (such as sexual intercourse) against his vow of celibacy; अवकीर्णी भवेद्गत्वा ब्रह्मचारी तु योषितम् . गर्दभं पशुमालभ्य नैरृतं स विशुध्यति .. <ls>Y. 3. 280</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 155</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 118-9</ls>; °व्रतं penance for an act of incontinence.
